Class MorraApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • MorraApp

  • public class MorraApp
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class is a Controller and Score keeper Class for Morra Game Applications. It provides methods for activities of Game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MorraApp(java.lang.String GamerName, java.lang.String VirtualGamerName)
      Constructor to create MorraApp object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MorraApp

        public MorraApp(java.lang.String GamerName,
                java.lang.String VirtualGamerName)
        Constructor to create MorraApp object. The Constructor sets Name's for PLayer.

        Internal: Also creates a score keeping two dimensional array . Each row of array represents session of Game. Column represents Game details for each player. e.g
        private ArrayList<Game[]> GameHistory; // The array is implemented using built-in ArrayList class

        Parameters:
        GamerName - - Gamer's Name
        VirtualGamerName - : Virtual Player Name (Computer)
        See Also:
        Game

    • Method Detail

      • ComputeAndSaveResult

        public void ComputeAndSaveResult(Game[] g)
        Takes Game[] and computes the score for each player in Game[]
        Parameters:
        g - Game[] array of Game objects.
        See Also:
        Game, MorraApp

      • DisplayResults

        public void DisplayResults()
        Displays for each session player name , the play for the session and score for the session. Finally also displays total score for each player.

      • init

        public void init()
        Initialize the Game System. Sets the playtype (even | odd) for each player. The playAsType is set on user input. The flow is to input any integer. If the integer is odd, The player play type is set to odd. The other player is automatically set to even. and visa versa.

      • RunGameRound

        public Game[] RunGameRound()
        Runs a round of the Game.
        Returns:
        Game[] Returns Game object for the round.

        Internal: The RunApp creates a Game object of each player of type Game Array e.g Game[]. For each player Play() method is invoked. Results are computed and stored in each player's Game object. Finally the Game[] is stored in two dimensional Array GameHistory Calls Play() method for each player. When the player has played the move. The results are computed and stored in GameHistory ArrayList.

        See Also:
        Game, MorraApp

      • totalScore

        public int totalScore(Player p)
        Parameters:
        p - Player object For player object return the total score for all rounds.
        Returns:
        TotalScore
